Method summary for the Vector class

MethodDescription
Vector.addAll()Adds all items to the list.
Vector.addItem()Adds the specified item to the list.
Vector.clear()Clear all items in the list /
Vector.containsItem()Checks whether the given object is an item of that list
Vector.getItem()Gets the item at the specified index
Vector.indexOf()Return the index number of a given list item
Vector.isEmpty()Checks whether the list is empty or not
Vector.removeItem()Removes an item from the list
Vector.size()Returns the number of items in the list
Vector.toArray()Returns the list as array object
